Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-chips] <sg777> if the `big-blind` player isn't allowed to `re-raise` then in that case will the round stops at `small-blind` player?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-chips] <sg777> @ComputerGenie üë¥üèºüì¢  please help

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-chips] <ComputerGenie üë¥üèºüì¢> `does the player with big-blind can re-raise again?`
The BB pays their bet "blind" and for that cost they "buy" the privilege to act last
__if no other player raises__ then after the SB acts, the BBs options are `check`(which means they forgo the option to raise), `raise`, or `fold`(rarely will any BB fold, but it is a valid option)
